attributes.action: Fair pay for frontline workers . No illegal inducement of salary
attributes.additional_details: Marine Scotland workers were one year late receiving a way below inflation salary rise with was awarded without negotiation . Return to talks and give us a fair deal
attributes.background: Recognise our work through the pandemic with fair pay

rejection.details: While we can see that you're concerned about pay, it's not clear what you'd like the Government to do. A petition has to set a clear, specific ask for the Government or Parliament to take on.
